title: Looking for unformal italic font
content:
Thx.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804020310im_/http:/typophile.com/files/302uhab_5754_5047.jpg)

Dear Cracks

I am looking for the informal italic font appearing in the poster shown on the top.  
I have taken a look at several modern types, but could not find that one.

I am shure, one of the professionals here will be able to identify the font.

Thx
author: space

comments.content:
We just had this: It's [Mimix](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804020310/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fsdesign/mimix/).  
There are even some free trial fonts of it IIRC.
